abstract: The telephone is a key tool for selling shoes online, says Zappos.com chief Tony Hsieh.
snippet: The telephone is a key tool for selling shoes online, says Zappos.com chief Tony Hsieh.
lead_paragraph: UPDATED 5:45 p.m.: Zappos.com laid off 8 percent of its staff Thursday. After employees Twittered the news and Valleywag picked it up, C.E.O. Tony Hsieh blogged about the decision.

headline.main: Making Sure the Shoe Fits at Zappos.com
